Rules.InvariantScript:
If(
    ThisItem.Title = "Dashboard",
    0,
    If(
        ThisItem.Title = "Inbox",
        140,
        If(
            ThisItem.Title = "Administration",
            370,
            If(
                ThisItem.Title = "Settings",
                50,
                If(
                    ThisItem.Title = "Configuration",
                    110,
                    0
                )
            )
        )
    )
)
